comment: He's a really nice professor, he likes to crack small jokes during the lectures which helps to keep us engaged. The lectures can be a little boring but he does a good job explaining the material. His homework isn't hard as long as you read the material or reread his presentations. The final isn't hard as its just a short presentation.
So specific for no reason. Make sure to follow the instructions to the last detail or he won't grade it and you'll get a zero.
